title: Episode 3 - Nick Schwaderer
description:
The Indiana Jones of Ruby Archaeology, Nick Schwaderer, joins the show. Nick has a banger for his Sin City Ruby talk, has an awesome new gem, and found a way to find a new hobby.

Links:

  • Past Rubies
  • @schwad_rb on Twitter
  • RubyConf 2021 - Ruby Archaeology
  • shoelace-rails-ui
  • shoelace-rails
  • Heritage Crafts

NOTE: I had some weird issues with my audio during this recording. Luckily, I rarely say anything interesting so I was able to cut out or re-record most of my bad audio. However, a few spots still remain. I'm sorry for the annoyance. I hope you still enjoy the episode!
summary: The Indiana Jones of Ruby Archaeology, Nick Schwaderer, joins the show. Nick has a banger for his Sin City Ruby talk, has an awesome new gem, and found a way to find a new hobby.
